tool_description: Provides Quotes Services . You can get quote with author name , type
name: GET Quote
title: GET Quote

api_list.name: GET Quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get by Type
api_list.description: Retrieve quote with type . ex: life
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote/type/life"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-quote1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
